statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 19 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 0 \\ 12 \\ 36 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
